Metadata.Title: Vengeful Justice
Metadata.Description: 14 agents, that's how many have failed this mission before you, 47. It's as sketchy as they get and I tried to stop them from asking you for it. But, as it just so seems, they don't value my opinion as much as I'd like. Time is of the essence, so make sure you check your watch every so often. Also, uniforms are tagged electronically, so no change of disguise this time.And then there's the catch. They need you to kill Joss and Hedlund with a letter opener. I don't know what the ICA is up to, 47
